channel.title: Cult Leader vs Prince - Draw? Bug?
channel.description:
Just had a game where I was Cult Leader vs. Prince and the game ended in a draw. Is this intended or a bug?
I can only see this being correct if Cult Leader and Prince are BOTH out of charges, but in this case I (CL) had bleeds and the Prince had nothing, so I thought that would be a win.

item.title: Cult Leader vs Prince - Draw? Bug?
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.source: Cult Leader vs Prince - Draw? Bug?
